translations: 做木工活（carpenter 的单三形式）

sentences.sentence: Modifications to the original design by local carpenters cut production time and costs.
sentences.translation: 当地木匠对原设计的修改缩短了生产时间和成本。

sentences.sentence: Other local carpenters have been trained in the new design so that they can respond to requests.
sentences.translation: 当地的其他木匠已经接受了新设计方面的培训，这样他们就可以响应客户的要求。

sentences.sentence: I'm having my carpenters work full time, but some important building materials are being delayed at the customs.
sentences.translation: 我让我的木匠全职工作，但是一些重要的建筑材料滞留在海关了。
